title: Worlds Missions not Working
body: So, I was playing and completing some of the quests, and was only 6k away from 100k gold in the mission. I go to bed, and when I play the next day, nothing registers. After this, as the screenshot shows, none of my quests are being completed. I have also done the wards missions.

replies.body: Hey there, it looks like you have an LCS icon equipped.  These missions will only work specifically with Worlds icons, such as the 20127 Worlds Championship Icon.  Sorry for the confusion!
Oh my god, just saw that at the top. That's unfortunate. Well at least it's not a glitch or anything. Thanks for the help!
